00039 EXP_ValueHandle EXP_CreateInt(int innie)
00040 {
00041     return (EXP_ValueHandle) new CIntValue(innie);
00042 }
00043 
00044 
00045 
00046 EXP_ValueHandle EXP_CreateBool(int innie)
00047 {
00048     return (EXP_ValueHandle) new CBoolValue(innie!=0);
00049 }

00053 EXP_ValueHandle EXP_CreateString(const char* str)
00054 {
00055     
00056     return (EXP_ValueHandle) new CStringValue(str,"");
00057 }

00062 {

00067 
00068 /* calculate expression from inputtext */
00069 EXP_ValueHandle EXP_ParseInput(const char* inputtext)
00070 {
00071     CValue* resultval=NULL;
00072     CParser parser;
00073     CExpression* expr = parser.ProcessText(inputtext);
00074     if (expr)
00075     {
00076         resultval = expr->Calculate();
00077         expr->Release();
00078     }
00079     else
00080     {
00081         resultval = new CErrorValue("couldn't parsetext");
00082     }
00083 
00084     return (EXP_ValueHandle) resultval;
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 
00089 void EXP_ReleaseValue(EXP_ValueHandle inval)
00090 {
00091     ((CValue*) inval)->Release();
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 
00096 int EXP_IsValid(EXP_ValueHandle inval)
00097 {
00098     return !((CValue*) inval)->IsError();
00099 }

00103 /* assign property 'propval' to 'destinationval' */
00104 void EXP_SetProperty(EXP_ValueHandle destinationval,
00105                      const char* propname,
00106                      EXP_ValueHandle propval)
00107 {
00108     ((CValue*) destinationval)->SetProperty(propname,(CValue*)propval);
00109 }

00115     return ((CValue*) inval)->GetText();
